resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105982</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105982</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770201823</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Children of Haiti Summit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kinder des Haiti Gipfels</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Enfants de sommet du Haïti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Crianças do summit de Haiti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Bambini della sommità dell'Haiti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παιδιά της Συνόδου Κορυφής της Αϊτής</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Niños de la cumbre de Haití</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This workshop can be conducted either before playing the Ayiti: The Cost of Life game, as a way to introduce students to the game's issues, or after playing the game, as a way to help them better understand the links between poverty and access to education.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieser Werkstatt kann geleitet werden irgendein, 
bevor man das Ayiti spielt: Die Kosten des Lebenspiels, als 
Methode, Kursteilnehmer zu den Ausgaben des Spiels vorzustellen oder 
nachdem das Spiel, als Methode, ihnen besser zu helfen, die Links 
zwischen Armut und Zugriff zur Ausbildung zu verstehen gespielt worden
ist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cet atelier peut être conduit l'un ou l'autre 
avant de jouer l'Ayiti : Le coût du jeu de la vie, comme voie 
de présenter des étudiants aux issues du jeu, ou après le jeu du 
jeu, comme voie de les aider mieux à comprendre les liens entre la 
pauvreté et l'accès à l'éducation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta oficina pode ser conduzida qualquer um antes 
de jogar o Ayiti: O custo do jogo da vida, como uma maneira 
introduzir estudantes às edições do jogo, ou após ter jogado o 
jogo, como uma maneira ajudar-lhes mais melhor compreender as 
ligações entre a pobreza e o acesso à instrução.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo workshop può essere condotto uno prima del
gioco del Ayiti: Il costo del gioco di vita, come modo 
introdurre gli allievi alle edizioni del gioco, o dopo il gioco del 
gioco, come modo aiutarle più meglio a capire i collegamenti fra 
povertà ed accesso a formazione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το εργαστήριο μπορεί να διευθυνθεί καθενός πρίν
παίζει το Ayiti: Το κόστος του παιχνιδιού ζωής, ως τρόπο
να εισαχθούν οι σπουδαστές στα ζητήματα του παιχνιδιού, ή μετά 
από να παίξει το παιχνίδι, ως τρόπο να ενισχυθούν να καταλάβουν 
καλύτερα τις συνδέσεις μεταξύ της ένδειας και της πρόσβασης στην 
εκπαίδευση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este taller puede ser conducido cualquiera antes 
de jugar el Ayiti: El coste del juego de la vida, como manera de
introducir a estudiantes a las ediciones del juego, o después de 
jugar el juego, como manera de ayudarles mejor a entender las 
conexiones entre la pobreza y el acceso a la educación.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770201823</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-nd/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-No Derivative Works 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105982</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/children-of-haiti-summit</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
